name: 2D Physics Engine Demo
description:
This is a fully-functional 2D physics engine created with C++ from scratch, without any third-party physics software. The application includes several scenes that show off the functionality, ranging from a small demo to a pinball game. This project also uses a state manager, which allows each scene to be easily created and added to the menu for use.

Created by 1 person over 6 weeks.

Just download and extract the .zip and run "Physics Engine.exe" in the Application folder.
